p.d: Uncle Bernard and Fadoul can now count on Lino, Papin and Ashley in their project to destabilise the Melody school. Meanwhile, Ethan gets to know Jimmy Jean-Louis, the famous Haitian actor. Directed by: Alain Guikou (Côte d'Ivoire/France, 2020) Cast: Andrea Gouré (Gina), Hicham Meroueh (Hussen Fadoul), Gabriel Zahon (Uncle Bernard), Serge Grah (Lino), Nancy Goulian (Marie), Landry Gnamba (Ethan), Franck Vlehi (Momo) With Jimmy Jean-Louis Genre: dramedy
